record.titleTypeName: Birthplace of the First President of the University of Chicago
record.description: Log House in which William Rainey Harper was born. The building now houses a museum run by Muskingum College, the school from which Dr. Harper graduated.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Copyright applied for the Log House in which William Rainey Harper was born.Lower right corner is missing. Stamp: University of Chicago Magazine.
